project.name: MBSA
project.description: Millennium Business Suite Anywhere (BSA) is web based ERP/CRM solution with integrated BPM

requireJavaVersion.message: To build this project JDK ${compile.jdk.version} is required. Please install it.

requireNoRepositories.message: Definition of new repositories is not allowed in order to deploy to Nexus repository.

requirePluginVersions.message: Build reproducibility : always define plugin versions
